  • Constructor Details

    • Grid

      public Grid(int x, int y, int width, int height, int cell_width, int cell_height)
      Constructor for Grid object. The width and height of the grid are used to determine how big each cell can be, by dividing the total length by number. A new CellStates attribute is called and set to cell_states. Finally, the 2D array is created and grid lines are turned on.
      Parameters:
      x - - number of cells wide
      y - - number of cells tall
      width - - width of grid
      height - - height of grid
      cell_width - - cell width
      cell_height - - cell height

  • Method Details

    • fixX

      private int fixX(int x)

    • fixY

      private int fixY(int y)

    • setState

      public void setState(int x, int y, byte state)

    • toggleState

      public void toggleState(int x, int y)

    • randomise

      public void randomise()
      Randomise checks every cell in the board and gives it a 50/50 change of being alive or dead.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear sets the private cells attribute to a new 2D array of bytes, therein clearing the board.

    • countNeighbours

      public int[] countNeighbours(int x, int y)
      Count neighbors takes an x and y coordinate for which cell to look at. Using that information all eight cells surrounding the chosen one are found. For each alive cell the count goes up. Finally, count is returned.
      Parameters:
      x - - x coord of cell
      y - - y coord of cell
      Returns:
      int[] an array with the first value containing the number of alive cells around a specific one

    • update

      public void update()
      update() determines the state of every cell by individually counting its neighbors and applying game rules. Then this grid object is set to the new state.

    • updateMany

      public void updateMany()
      Functionality for the fast-forward key. This class looks at the private many object and runs update() that many times.

    • getPrevious

      public void getPrevious()
      getPrevious updates the 2D array of bytes to be equal to the last save in this.previousGrids only if the size of the arraylist is greater than 1. Lastly the arraylist removes the updated save.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics graphics)
      Draw takes a graphic object and draws the individual cells and grid lines on the grid. This method is called at the initialization stage of a game when all the assets are drawn to the canvas.
      Parameters:
      graphics - - Graphics containing all the assets for the game of life

    • load

      public void load(String filename)
      Loads a game state by using a reader object and finding all instances of . or o.
      Parameters:
      filename - - String value containing the name of the save

    • findLoadWH

      public int[] findLoadWH(String filename)
      findLoadWH takes a filename and returns an array of integers which contain the width and the height of a save state. The enables loading a file by updating the grid size beforehand.
      Parameters:
      filename - - A string value containing the name of the save
      Returns:
      int[] - an array of integers with the width and height of a save state

    • findComments

      public String findComments(String filename)
      findComments reads a save file and attempts to find any comments at the bottom of the save. Comments are labeled with #:. If there are no comments null will be returned rather than the string of comments.
      Parameters:
      filename - - A string value containing the name of the save state
      Returns:
      String - a string value with the comments of a save state

    • save

      public void save(String filename, String comments)
      save takes both a filename and comments and save the current state of the board game. Using a writer object the file has . and o written to represent dead and alive cells.
      Parameters:
      filename - - a string value containing the name of the file
      comments - - a string value containing any save comments

    • getCell_states

      public CellStates getCell_states()

    • setMany

      public void setMany(int many)

    • getMany

      public int getMany()
